title: Where is the new broadcast tower for WILM TV located and what areas will it serve? Is the power as strong as the current tower in Delco?  (I am referring to WILT Channel 24 which is rebroadcasting the WILM signals?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/06/where-is-wilms-new-tv-tower/
